column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for taking the time to write a review
column2: Emma.  I am so sorry to hear about the disappointing pizza you received.  If you wouldn't mind
column3: our manager would like the chance to speak with you about this.  I will send you a private message so we can connect with you directly.  Thank you again for your review - we appreciate you bringing this to our attention.
